name: ResumeMaker File
summary: Learn about .RMR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ResumeMaker includes several resume templates for use by a variety of professions. ResumeMaker is available in Professional Deluxe or Ultimate versions.

description: Resume file created by ResumeMaker, a program that allows users to create professional resumes; contains resume page formatting, text, and images; can be exported to Microsoft Word (.DOC) format.
